content.p: What is the {{min_max}} that a cancer death rate (per 100,000 people per year) could be in 2011 and still be {{dir_1}} than {{percent_1}} of the rates of the other countries in the dataset? Explain your answer.
Find and explain what the {{quar_2}} means in terms of the countries in the dataset and their cancer death rates (per 100,000 people per year) in 2011.

outtro.p: {{percent_2}} of the countries in the dataset had a cancer death rate of {{change_2}} (per 100,000 people per year) or less.

content.p: Find and interpret the Z-score for a death rate from cancer of {{za}} per 100,000 people per year in 2011 (round to 2 decimal places)
Find the 5 number summary of this data set.
Find the IQR of this data set, and use it to identify any potential outliers.
Describe the shape of the distribution of the cancer death rate per 100,000 people per year in 2011 .
